dao

Class TaskDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.TaskDAO

  • public class TaskDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for accessing database data regarding Tasks.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      TaskDAO()

                                                               java.sql.SQLException,

                                                               java.lang.IllegalAccessException

        limit - the number of Tasks to be shown
        Returns:
        a CachedRowSet with all Tasks(in detail) based on latest deadlines
